attributes.action: Stop the cancellation of local elections that are to be held in May
attributes.additional_details: Up hold democratic elections that are due to be held across the country in May 2025
attributes.background: I want to vote in my local council elections that are to be held across the country in May,including my home county of Derbyshire. It has been reported on Derbyshire live the council want to cancel due to reshaping purposes

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
